titleStmt.title: Whitehall, July 23. 1696. This evening arrived here an express from my Lord Berkeley with letters dated the 20th of this month, off Ushant, which bring the account that follows. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones in the Savoy,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
